projects.title: Outrun
projects.description:
In a dicussion with a prof I got intressted if you could code a game that would run smoothly in the browser with no canvas.

I tried to replicate the awesome Outrun from 1986. I really enjoy the result.

projects.title: Gl체hb채r
projects.description:
Three designers and I had an idea, a simple one. A bear with sleep issues but he can sleep when he drinks enough. Simple, but good.

I got group lead and did all the code, thanks to my friends this game is marvelous.

projects.title: HUEBOO VR
projects.description:
Two friends and I took on the challange to create our first VR Game.

I worked on both, the 3D models as well as the code.

You're asked to mixs drinks for the spooky ghosts. Can you do it? ;D

projects.title: Transmission
projects.description:
My first time at the Global Game Jam. 48h to code a game. I coded a custom engine and the gameplay, two friends did the art

In transmission you try to send a single through the solar system.

projects.title: The DI Museum
projects.description: Our class does not have any place to present our work. So I took in upon myself to create it, the project includes a custom CMS and the 3D landing page. I used it as a chance to experiment with a few new things.

projects.title: Code Wiki
projects.description:
I am not old but I have done many things. Most of which I forgot. That had to stop. I leanred Node.js and Mongo and a lot more and started working on a solution.

CodeWiki is my place to store things and I welcome everyone to contribiute.

projects.title: Adminer Theme
projects.description:
Ahh Adminer. You are the best SQL manager out there. One file, so simple. Why on earth must you look like you're from 1970.

I took SCSS and the Material Design Guide and coded ahead. It's on GitHub now.

projects.title: MatTab
projects.description:
Chrome has this nice new tab page but I can do one better. I've never done a broweser extension but this seemed like a good start.

Basiclly better Windows 8 tiles in Chrome.

projects.title: Tree Generator
projects.description:
In math we looked at L-Systems... and I was really bored. It was all way to simple and didn't even look intressting.

Therefore I opened CodePen and tried to get into more depth (haha, because 3D) with them, you can really fall in love with them.

projects.title: Minesweeper Solver
projects.description:
Minesweeper is one of these games that is actually fun to play but somehow isn't.

It just intressted me if one could automate it... :)
